description: GitHub label definitions for Agent pipeline workflow

labels.name: agent
labels.description: Agent pipeline enabled - triggers automated workflow

labels.name: agent:queued
labels.description: Queued for processing - issue validated

labels.name: agent:intake
labels.description: Intake processing - validating issue and generating plan

labels.name: agent:needs-supplement
labels.description: Issue needs more detail - update issue description to retry

labels.name: agent:spec-created
labels.description: Spec generated and committed to feature branch

labels.name: agent:planning
labels.description: Planning phase active - research and design

labels.name: agent:clarification
labels.description: Awaiting user clarification - questions posted

labels.name: agent:needs-input
labels.description: Spec invalid or incomplete - needs user input

labels.name: agent:plan-review
labels.description: Plan ready for review - react üëç to approve

labels.name: agent:plan-approved
labels.description: Plan approved by user - proceeding to tasks

labels.name: agent:generating-tasks
labels.description: Task generation in progress

labels.name: agent:tasks-review
labels.description: Tasks ready for review - react üëç to approve

labels.name: agent:tasks-approved
labels.description: Tasks approved by user - proceeding to implementation

labels.name: agent:implementing
labels.description: Implementation in progress - executing tasks

labels.name: agent:checkpoint
labels.description: Checkpoint reached - awaiting approval to continue

labels.name: agent:blocked
labels.description: Blocked - task failed after retries, needs human intervention

labels.name: agent:impl-complete
labels.description: Implementation complete - all tasks finished

labels.name: agent:qa-running
labels.description: QA tests running - validating implementation

labels.name: agent:qa-failed
labels.description: QA tests failed - attempting auto-fix

labels.name: agent:needs-manual-fix
labels.description: Requires manual fix - auto-fix failed after retries

labels.name: agent:qa-passed
labels.description: QA tests passed - ready for PR creation

labels.name: agent:pr-approved
labels.description: User approved PR creation - creating pull request

labels.name: agent:pr-creating
labels.description: Creating pull request

labels.name: agent:pr-open
labels.description: Pull request open - awaiting review

labels.name: agent:complete
labels.description: Workflow complete - PR merged, feature delivered
